FuncDef: When theignore-router-idcommand is present, and the current best path to a destination was learned from EBGP peer X with BGP identifier x and a new path is received from EBGP peer Y with BGP identifier y, the best path remains unchanged if the new path is equivalent to the current best path up to the BGP identifier comparison - even if y is less than x.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to two internal families to be included in this configuration. Values-mvpn-ipv4, mvpn-ipv6.
